positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
C++, Python, Scala, Kafka, Cassandra, Splunk, Comdb2, Postgres, multi-threading, distributed calculation system, Gradle, CMake, GIT, llcalc, plink, BPKG, SYMV
1. Fixed bugs and enhanced features for Trading Solution Application Development Framework.
2. Researched Stream Reactor open source Bloomberg API Kafka Connect. Fixed some serious bugs and implemented authentication/authorization/general topic subscription features. Bug fixes and new features were contributed back to open source community.
3. Participated in improving Protocol Bridge and its associated operational tools.
4. Implemented Splunk Protocol Bridge dashboard for Workflows and RHUB Messages as RHUB operational tool.
5. Created CMake files for BciMessageStore project and implemented functions for Cassandra message store.

…
see more

positions.title: Senior Quantitative Developer
positions.description:
C++, C#, multi-threading, SQL, R, Python, distributed calculation system, PolyPaths, SAS
1. Implemented agency loan level prepayment model (C++ 11) and integrated it into PolyPaths.
2. Implemented model calculation on local and distributed system.
3. Improved model calculation speed 1,000 times through multiple performance tuning iterations.
4. Implemented commercial loan valuation tool on Excel spread sheet by using C++/CLI and VSTO (Visual Studio Tool for Office).

…
see more

positions.title: Associate Director/Senior Develolper
positions.companyName: Royal Bank of Canada Capital Markets
positions.description:
C#, C++, Perl, Python, Java, Excel, XLL, VBA, PolyPaths, Intex API, SQL, WPF, WinForm, WWF, Objected Oriented Analysis, Design and Programming, Agile, NUnit, SVN, CVS, UNIX, Risk Management
1. Lead and develop a cutting edge framework for integrating off-the-shelf vendor systems such as PolyPaths, Bloomberg data license, Intex, AFT, Trepp, and Markit for MBS/CMBS/ABS/CLO risk analytics into RBC Capital Markets’ enterprise risk management systems.
2. Build PolyPaths PROD, UAT, and DEV distributed calculation grids with about 600 total calculators. Setup Intex and AFT library for PolyPaths. Implement tools to monitor and maintain PolyPaths grids in good status.
3. Update AFT prepayment and default model monthly data. Assist traders and risk managers to fine tune model parameters.
4. Implement sensitivity based VaR system on OAS, partial duration, partial mortgage spread duration, and partial vega.
5. Implement automation programs to generate daily risk reports for regular VaR, stress VaR, stress scenarios, back testing, and PnL decomposition.
6. Design and build an open, flexible task manager framework for automation programs from scratch.
…
see more

positions.title: Senior Research Analyst
positions.description:
Financial Engineering Group
Skills: C++, MATLAB, Intex API, Objected Oriented Analysis, Design and Programming, Linux, UNIX, Sun compiler, g++, Java, CVS Version Control System, Purify
1. Maintain and improve current C++ FARM( Framework for Analytic, Research and Modeling ) library of interest rate, house price appreciation, prepayment, default, severity, and valuation models.
2. Work as part of Financial Engineering team to design, develop, implement, test and deliver frameworks / components / applications used in risk management, trading and model performance measurement.
